snippet: A California judge ruled that Oracle was required under its contract with Hewlett-Packard to continue to offer its software on H.P.’s Itanium server platform.
abstract: California Superior Court Judge James P Kleinberg rules in favor of Hewlett-Packard in a lawsuit over the Oracle Corp's decision to end support for certain servers made by HP.
lead_paragraph: A California judge ruled that Oracle was required under its contract with Hewlett-Packard to continue to offer its software on H.P.’s Itanium server platform.

headline.seo: H.P. Wins Suit Against Oracle Over Support for Servers
headline.main: Hewlett-Packard Wins Suit Against Oracle Over Contract
headline.print_headline: Hewlett-Packard Wins Suit Against Oracle Over Contract
